name: Love me knot
description:
There's no danger of anyone KNOT loving you wearing this cute little bracelet! 

Its adjustable to fit most wrists. The lovely wooden heart shape is secured onto hot pink cord for a look Ã  la mode. 

2 available, one had gold coloured beads, the other plain wooden ones. Please specify which you'd prefer when you place your order.

name: Cut the mustard
description:
Goes well with ham, goes even better on your sofa!

Upcycled from retro 70's fabric, this has been made with love in a pet-free, smoke-free home/garden*.

Measures approx 16" x 15" and comes complete with the cushion inner. For decorative use only, not recommended for washing.

If you don't mind getting mustard stuck to your moustache, check out my complimenting 'mustashion' in the same fabric.

* When it was sunny.

name: Mean Mr Moustashion!
description:
This cheeky fellow doesn't sleep in the park, nor does he shave in the dark; but he'd love a snooze on your chair or sofa!

Upcycled from retro 70's fabric, this 'moustashion' has been made with love in a pet-free, smoke-free home/garden*.

Measures approx 16" x 15" and comes complete with the cushion inner. For decorative use only, not recommended for washing. 

If you love the fabric, but not so much the facial fuzz, check out my complimenting cushion in the same fabric.





* When it was sunny.
